original_title: Sur les traces de Mamani Abdoulaye
overview: “Abdoulaye Mamani, a militant and trade unionist, journalist, engaged writer, led a lifelong struggle for people’s freedom and the independence of his country, Niger. Retracing the footsteps of my father, twenty-three years after his death, I gradually rediscover not only his story but also that of my country.”
title: Sur les traces de Mamani Abdoulaye
